General.Name: Suzhou Shijing Environmental Technology Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Suzhou Shijing Environmental Technology Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells pollution detection and environmental protection equipment. The company offers regenerative thermal incinerators, rubber industry vacuum vulcanizer exhaust gas treatment systems, VOC adsorption desorption, catalytic combustion, recycling systems, plasma organic exhaust gas purifiers, deodorizing organic purification towers, silane and organic systems, photocatalytic systems, exhaust gas integrated treatment systems, and RTO air volume systems. It also provides casting sand production line dust removal systems, pulse dust collectors, AOD lu dust collectors, rotary dust covers, crane passing and rolling mill converter dust collecting systems, mine ore processing dust collection systems, pulsating filter bag and cartridge dust collectors, explosion-proof dust collectors, falling sand and sand treatment dust collection systems, grinding and cleaning the dust collection systems, and sintered board dust collectors; and deodorizing scrubbers, nitrogen oxide treatment units, high-temperature and manual pickling line nox purification equipment systems, acid-base systems, automobile manufacturing and nitrogen oxide gas generation systems, and acid gasification systems. In addition, the company provides circulating fluidized bed semi-dry flue gas and NID semi-dry flue gas desulfurization technology, limestone/lime-gypsum wet desulfurization technology, selective non-catalytic reduction and denitration technology, LCR purification technology, liquid catalyst plus dry desulfurization and LCR denitrification, limestone-gypsum flue gas desulfurization technology, denitration desulfurization integrated towers. The company was formerly known as Suzhou Shijing Environmental Protection Equipment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Suzhou Shijing Environmental Technology Co.,Ltd. in October 2015. Suzhou Shijing Environmental Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is based in Suzhou, China.
